title: Adult Asystole / Pulseless Electrical Activity
description: Protocol for managing adult asystole and pulseless electrical activity (PEA) with clear decision pathways and reversible causes

return_spontaneous_circulation.text: AT ANY TIME: Return of Spontaneous Circulation - Go to Post Resuscitation Protocol AC-10
return_spontaneous_circulation.note: This can occur at any point during resuscitation - exit to AC-10

criteria_for_death.text: Criteria for Death / No Resuscitation? Review DNR / MOST Form

death_criteria_list.text: Death Criteria: Decomposition, Rigor mortis, Dependent lividity, Blunt force trauma, Injury incompatible with life, Extended downtime with asystole

do_not_resuscitate_policy.text: Do NOT begin resuscitation. Follow Deceased Persons Policy.

details: Change Compressors every 2 minutes (sooner if fatigued)

iv_io_access.text: IV or IO Access - Protocol UP-6

administer_epinephrine.text: Epinephrine (1:10,000) 1 mg IV/IO - Repeat every 5 minutes

normal_saline_bolus.text: Normal Saline Bolus 500 mL IV/IO - May repeat as needed, Maximum 2 L

details: Evaluate patient for all reversible causes

reversible_causes_list.text: Reversible Causes: Hypovolemia, Hypoxia, Hydrogen ion (acidosis), Hypothermia, Hypo/Hyperkalemia, Tension pneumothorax, Tamponade (cardiac), Toxins, Thrombosis - pulmonary (PE), Thrombosis - coronary (MI)
reversible_causes_list.note: Address reversible causes as they are identified

administer_naloxone.text: Administer Naloxone per Overdose / Toxic Ingestion Protocol TE-7
administer_naloxone.note: Follow Protocol TE-7 for Naloxone administration

check_blood_glucose.text: Blood Glucose Analysis Procedure if applicable

termination_or_continue.text: On Scene Resuscitation / Termination of Resuscitation Protocol(s) AC-12 as indicated

terminate_on_scene.text: Terminate resuscitation per Protocol AC-12 and local policy

continue_resuscitation.note: Return to CPR and sequence above

notify_destination_medical_control.text: Notify Destination or Contact Medical Control
